issue.title: [Python] distutils import warning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9692](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9692). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Running `setup.py` displays this warning message:
```Java

/home/antoine/miniconda3/envs/pyarrow/lib/python3.7/site-packages/setuptools/distutils_patch.py:26: UserWarning: Distutils was imported before Setuptools. This usage is discouraged and may exhibit undesirable behaviors or errors. Please use Setuptools' objects directly or at least import Setuptools first.
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9692?focusedCommentId=17175770) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7931
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7931>
